EmailTemplate.name: WO 36 hours after WO moved to 03 - Proof Sent Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} - 36 hours since moved to 03 - Proof Sent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
It's been 36 hours since the mockup for Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} was sent to the customer and we haven't received approval. Please follow up with {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} to avoid delays.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
